setting.label: Polling time to match playback time to skip position:
setting.values: 50 milliseconds | 100 milliseconds | 200 milliseconds | 300 milliseconds | 500 milliseconds | 750 milliseconds | 1 second | 2 seconds | 5 seconds

setting.label: Expect all time stamp files to be 'skip.txt' or '[videoname]'_skip.txt'?
Use time stamp files that include video folder name?
Use reverse matching for time stamp files and video/folder names (see readme)?
Pad start times (to prevent abrupt skips)
setting.values: 0 seconds | 0.5 seconds | 1 seconds | 1.5 seconds | 2 seconds | 3 seconds
